name: WP Auto Reload Widgets
author: Vijaya kumar

sections.description: WP Auto Reload Widgets Plugin is allow you to refresh your widgets period of time. Not only text widgets it is support all wordpress widgets. Set the time in seconds and automatically reload / refresh your widgets. Once Installed pugin find \”Auto Reload Widget Settings\” under settings on wordpress dashboard.
sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin via the WordPress.org plugin directory, or download the plugin
  2. Upload the files to your server
  3. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ menu in WordPress
    4) After activating the plugin find the settings on \”Auto Reload Widget Settings\”
sections.faq:
Auto Reload Widget Widgets Plugin Supports all type of wp widgets?
yes, it is support all widgets, including text,image,posts widgets.

How we set the time?
Time calculated in seconds.

If in-case plugin is not working for me?
Contact our support to fix this issue immediately.

short_description: Wp Auto Reload Widgets plugin allow you to refresh all of widgets in period of time. Set time in seconds and automatically refresh.
